snippet: The Argentine striker Facundo Ferreyra completed a move to Newcastle United after joining foreign stars who refused to play with the Ukrainian champion Shakhtar Donetsk because of the country’s conflict.
abstract: Striker Facundo Ferreyra completes move to Newcastle United after joining foreign soccer stars who refused to play with Ukrainian soccer club Shakhtar Donetsk because of conflict in Ukraine.
lead_paragraph: The Argentine striker Facundo Ferreyra completed a move to Newcastle United after joining foreign stars who refused to play with the Ukrainian champion Shakhtar Donetsk because of the country’s conflict.

headline.main: Facundo Ferreyra Set to Play for Newcastle United
headline.print_headline: Argentine Set to Play for Newcastle United
